queryList.question: Top 5 Areas in Los Angeles with highest average HPI and number of crimes in descending order
Which area and in which premise, are most open cases in?
What are the details of the crime that occurred in the Central area on the sidewalk and involved a pistol, and what is the corresponding housing information for the same region?"
queryList.query:
PREFIX cds: <https://data.lacity.org/resource/>
PREFIX hds: <https://www.zillow.com/research/data#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
DESCRIBE ?crime
WHERE {
  ?crime rdf:type cds:CrimeRecord .
  ?housing rdf:type hds:HousingRecord .
  ?crime cds:area_name ?location .
  ?crime cds:weapon_desc ?weaponDesc .
  ?crime cds:premis_desc ?premiseDesc .
  ?housing hds:inRegion ?location .
  FILTER regex(?premiseDesc, "SIDEWALK", "i") .
  FILTER regex(?weaponDesc, "PISTOL", "i") .
  FILTER regex(?location, "Central", "i") .
}

queryList.question: Is there a correlation between high housing prices and crimes involving weapons in certain areas, specifically when the victim is aged 25 or younger and the weapon used is the same in another crime in the same city and state with a lower housing price?
what weapons were used in a certain area to victimize people of a certain age, sex, and descent, and the housing prices in the area
